name: Chef Quest
description:
Oh no! Chef is out of ingredients so it's time to venture into the restaurant's dungeon to restock the larder with delicious monsters. Chef Quest is a tiny, action-oriented RPG of culinary delights.

Chef Quest was my entry for the RESET 64 4kb Competition (2018). Despite appearances and tiny file size there's a bit of depth to how the game works (which confused most people, and is a good lesson that hopefully I learn one day). It is highly recommended you read the instructions first before playing.
